title: Calicut University Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Research Assistant Post
description: Calicut University has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we provided more information about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the Calicut University Recruitment 2025 .
